description: This file defines Data Transfer Objects (DTOs) for creating and updating pictograms in a Java application, specifically within the package 'com.example.demo.web.dto'. It contains two inner static classes, 'CreatePictogramRequest' and 'UpdatePictogramRequest', which include validation annotations and fields relevant to pictogram data.

classes.name: PictogramDtos
classes.description: Container class for DTOs related to pictogram creation and updating.

classes.name: CreatePictogramRequest
classes.description: DTO for creating a new pictogram, includes fields for title, description, ownerId, and asset URLs with validation annotations.

classes.name: UpdatePictogramRequest
classes.description: DTO for updating an existing pictogram, includes optional fields for title, description, and asset URLs with validation annotations.
